mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member( MEMBER_NO, PASSWORD, EMAIL, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, ADDRESS, PHONE_NUMBER, POST_CODE, SIGNUP_DATE, gender, LAST_IP ) values( seq_member_no.nextval ,#{password} ,#{email}, #{firstName} ,#{lastName} ,null, #{phoneNumber} ,null ,SYSDATE, #{gender} ,null )

Insert into product(product_id, name, p_size, price, detail, gender, category_id, receipt_date, profile_pt, quantity) values(seq_productid_no.nextval, #{name}, #{p_size}, #{price}, #{p_detail}, #{gender}, #{category_id}, sysdate, #{profile_pt}, #{quantity})
